customFields.Priority P1 to P4: P2 - Core Functions (Do core functions work?)
customFields.Update notes: Linda 22 Aug 2022: Added RN_Smoke_Tests label during test case cleanup.

inline.description:
Edit profile
————————————————————————————
  1. Tap the three-dot menu in the top right of your screen
  2. Tap "Edit Profile" option
  3. Verify Save does not appear tappable until a change is made
  4. Tap the photo, update to new or different pic
  5. Add or update first or last name
  6. Add or update nickname
  7. Tap Save
  8. Verify edit mode closes and you're viewing profile screen again
inline.expectedResult: • Your profile picture and any visible name, etc., display what you updated them to
